TITLE Greens Beans and Pasta
# In a large bowl prepare [8 cup [coarsely chopped] spinach leaves] and [15 oz cannellini beans]; set aside.
# Cook [6 oz Cavatappi] until al dente.
# Meanwhile, in a microwave safe dish combine:{[2 tbl olive oil][1/4 tsp salt][1/4 tsp pepper][2 cloves garlic [, crushed]]}
# Microwave garlic oil in 20 second bursts until the garlic is fragrant and just starting to color. Let stand while the pasta cooks.
# To the large bowl of spinach and beans add the cooked pasta, garlic oil, [2 oz [shredded] Asiago cheese], and [black pepper].
# Toss to combine.
